li.label: aestheticist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is much more strongly affected by the beauty (or ugliness) of {PAWN_possessive} surroundings and fellow persons.

li.label: agrizoophobe
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} might be fine with tame animals, but few things are more terrifying to {PAWN_objective} than wild or insane animals. {PAWN_pronoun} is prone to uncontrollable panic if any are nearby.

li.label: allegiant
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is steadfastly loyal to {PAWN_possessive} faction. {PAWN_pronoun} tries harder to get along with {PAWN_possessive} compatriots and will never bail on them.\n\nIf imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be exceptionally uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

li.label: asocial
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't care for conversation. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't chitchat with others, never engages in social recreation, and doesn't enjoy parties. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind it when others slight or insult {PAWN_objective} - it's just words, after all.

li.label: bookworm
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} could spend hours lost between the pages of a good book - {PAWN_pronoun} will feel happier after spending enough time reading. However, this preoccupation with reading has caused {PAWN_objective} to slightly neglect more physical pursuits.

li.label: champion
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is driven to great heights by thoughts of those dear to {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} works harder, learns faster, and becomes more resistant to pain and stress based on the total strength of {PAWN_possessive} positive relationships.

li.label: conversationalist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a master of small talk; speaking with others grants them a stacking mood bonus. If {PAWN_pronoun} goes on a mental break, it is likely to be an insulting spree.

li.label: daydreamer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an overactive imagination. At random, or if {PAWN_pronoun} becomes too stressed, {PAWN_pronoun} will retreat into {PAWN_possessive} imagination, resulting in a harmless mental break. After indulging {PAWN_possessive} imagination in such a way, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes inspired.

li.label: drudge
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally skilled at basic tasks, but struggles with advanced concepts. Except for shooting, melee, and social, {PAWN_possessive} skills degrade rapidly while above level 10.

li.label: graver
li.description: Looking at corpses makes {PAWN_nameDef} happy, and {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind wearing tainted apparel.

li.label: hale
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is filled with vigor. {PAWN_pronoun} is difficult to harm, and is quick to bounce back from exhaustion, injury, and illness.

li.label: hedonist
li.description: Fun is everything to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} never gets bored of any kind of recreation, but {PAWN_pronoun} needs it more frequently than others.

li.label: hotfoot
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves swiftly and lightly.

li.label: hysteric
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} goes into exaggerated histrionics when below {PAWN_possessive} mental break threshold, stressing out anyone who can see or hear {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: judgemental
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is quick to assume the worst of other people. {PAWN_possessive} opinions of others are much more strongly influenced by negative impressions than positive ones.

li.label: lech
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really likes anyone {PAWN_pronoun} could be even a little attracted to. Sadly, the way in which {PAWN_pronoun} exhibits this is gross and creepy, so they tend not to like {PAWN_objective} back.

li.label: lovesick
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs someone to love with all {PAWN_possessive} being. {PAWN_possessive} mood soars immensely when {PAWN_pronoun} has a lover, but {PAWN_pronoun} is much more sensitive to romantic hurt, and those who spurn {PAWN_objective} also suffer.

li.label: mariner
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves being in the water. {PAWN_pronoun} enjoys getting wet, and swims quite quickly.

li.label: metabolic freak
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has an inexplicably robust metabolism. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't need to eat as often and never gets food poisoning. So long as the food isn't raw, {PAWN_pronoun} also doesn't care what it is.

li.label: outdoorsy
li.description: Roughing it out in the wilderness doesn't bother {PAWN_nameDef}, but {PAWN_pronoun} despises being locked indoors.

li.label: people pleaser
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} craves the approval of those {PAWN_pronoun} knows. {PAWN_pronoun} is happy when others like {PAWN_objective}, and sad when they don't.

li.label: repressed rage
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harbors an extremely dangerous dark side which comes out when {PAWN_pronoun} starts to lose control. While stressed or in a mental break, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes much faster, stronger, and harder to subdue; during such an episode, any damage {PAWN_pronoun} takes may cause {PAWN_objective} to go berserk.

li.label: reveller
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is all about the party life! {PAWN_pronoun} throws a party whenever {PAWN_pronoun} becomes inspired, and {PAWN_pronoun} loves attending any sort of social function.

li.label: sadistic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gains mood and has a chance to become inspired when other people mentally break or socially fight. However, this tends not to endear {PAWN_objective} to those people.

li.label: skulker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is quite adept at evading detection. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn’t leave tracks and is difficult to spot. {PAWN_pronoun} even helps mask the passage of caravans {PAWN_pronoun} is part of.

li.label: sniper
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can pick out targets at further distances than anyone else. However, {PAWN_pronoun} is less talented at close-quarters combat, and {PAWN_pronoun} feels unsafe without a ranged weapon.

li.label: staid
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} lacks some sort of ineffable inner spark. {PAWN_pronoun} won't recreate, doesn't care for beauty, and can't become inspired.

li.label: tempestophile
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves turbulent weather. {PAWN_pronoun} receives a slight mood boost when the weather acts up, and exotic conditions like eclipses, auroras, or even toxic fallout bring {PAWN_objective} great joy.

li.label: tranquil
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is utterly at peace. {PAWN_pronoun} will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.

li.label: tranquil
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is utterly at peace. {PAWN_pronoun} will not participate in violence, and can't mentally break. Ever.

li.label: vagabond
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn’t feel the need to be in a community. If things get too bad, or if {PAWN_pronoun} experiences a random surge of wanderlust, {PAWN_pronoun} will leave.\n\nIf imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

li.label: vain
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is obsessed with {PAWN_possessive} own appearance. {PAWN_possessive} beauty and the quality of {PAWN_possessive} apparel impact {PAWN_possessive} mood.

li.label: vicious
li.description: Violent intent builds up within {PAWN_nameDef}, causing {PAWN_possessive} mood to worsen until {PAWN_pronoun} unleashes it in a savage, lethal burst.

li.label: visionary
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} occasionally has episodes of profound insight during which {PAWN_pronoun} will create a schematic for a new technology. This happens more frequently when {PAWN_pronoun} is happier.

li.label: winsome
li.description: There's just something really likeable about {PAWN_nameDef}.

li.label: entitled
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, {PAWN_pronoun} loses motivation, so {PAWN_pronoun} works and learns slower.

li.label: prideful
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has high expectations at minimum. When they are met, {PAWN_pronoun} becomes motivated, so {PAWN_pronoun} works and learns faster.

li.label: humble
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} keeps {PAWN_possessive} expectations low, no matter how pampered {PAWN_pronoun} gets. Even if {PAWN_pronoun} gains a position of authority, {PAWN_possessive} expectations still won't progress past the moderate level.

li.label: imperceptive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} pays less attention to {PAWN_possessive} senses than most. Though this is mostly disadvantageous, {PAWN_pronoun} can sleep soundly through anything, as well as weather more trying temperatures.

li.label: keen senses
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has very sharp senses. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes {PAWN_objective} more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.

li.label: powerful senses
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has senses almost on par with bionic augmentation. Though this is mostly a boon, it also makes {PAWN_objective} more sensitive to comfort, discomfort and extreme temperatures.

li.label: mighty
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} hones {PAWN_possessive} body to a state of notable physical fitness, allowing {PAWN_objective} to carry more and hit harder.

li.label: herculean
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is immensely, ridiculously strong, allowing {PAWN_objective} to carry far more and hit far harder.

li.label: overly credulous
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is so gullible it beggars belief. {PAWN_pronoun} is very strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, yet is also very susceptible to conversion attempts.

li.label: credulous
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes almost anything anyone tells {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} is strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, yet is also susceptible to conversion attempts.

li.label: adherent
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has nearly unshakable faith in {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion. {PAWN_pronoun} is strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, and is very resistant to conversion attempts.

li.label: unquestioning adherent
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} spends every breath in service of {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion. {PAWN_pronoun} is very strongly affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion, and is immune to conversion attempts.

li.label: doubtful
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is chronically uncertain about everything; {PAWN_pronoun} is less affected by {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion.

li.label: intolerant
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} dislikes and distrusts anyone who doesn't believe the things {PAWN_pronoun} does. Conversion attempts upset {PAWN_objective}, and changing to a new ideo frightens {PAWN_objective} terribly.

li.label: tolerant
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} tolerates those who don’t follow {PAWN_possessive} beliefs. {PAWN_pronoun} isn't quite so upset with non-believers who violate {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion's taboos, and {PAWN_pronoun} isn’t upset by botched conversion attempts.

li.label: subjugator
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn’t just want to be above others - {PAWN_pronoun} needs others to be far beneath {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} can be satisfied by holding a position of authority or by the presence of enough slaves.

li.label: liberator
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes freedom is a right everyone should enjoy. {PAWN_pronoun} disapproves of slavery, and, to a lesser extent, imprisonment of anyone {PAWN_pronoun} knows.\n\nIf imprisoned, {PAWN_pronoun} will be uncooperative with {PAWN_possessive} captors.

li.label: conformist
li.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, maintaining ideoligious solidarity is more important than embracing the truth. {PAWN_pronoun} will never be in the ideoligious minority for longer than two days; {PAWN_pronoun} then converts to whatever the most people in the faction {PAWN_pronoun} belongs to (or is enslaved by) believes.

li.label: guru
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} projects a sense of wisdom, allowing {PAWN_objective} to use the abilities of a moral guide. If {PAWN_pronoun} actually has the moral guide role, {PAWN_pronoun} will have two copies of the ability set, on separate cooldowns.

li.label: persecution complex
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels restless and unhappy when {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion is in the majority. Conversely, {PAWN_pronoun} works harder and is more determined when in the minority.

li.label: proclaimer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is very eager to convert others to {PAWN_possessive} ideoligion.

li.label: radical thinker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} constantly questions the nature and purpose of reality, personhood, and other profound topics. As a result, {PAWN_pronoun} may randomly come up with a new ideoligion, which {PAWN_pronoun} will be very passionate about spreading.

li.label: superstitious
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes in a wide variety of superstitions. As {PAWN_pronoun} randomly comes across what {PAWN_pronoun} believes to be omens, {PAWN_possessive} mood will fluctuate.

li.label: misopedist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts children and pregnant people.

li.label: caretaker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes that children are the most important thing in the universe. {PAWN_pronoun} enjoys taking care of them; living in a place without kids makes {PAWN_objective} feel empty.

li.label: mechaphile
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes having mechanoids around. {PAWN_pronoun} will be saddened if an allied mechanoid dies.

li.label: mechaphobe
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} hates mechanoids, and {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes and distrusts those who control them. This antipathy is so strong that {PAWN_pronoun} can project it to discombobulate mechanoids, provided {PAWN_pronoun} has the means to broadcast on their bandwidth.

li.label: environmentalist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thinks the beauty and health of the land should be preserved. {PAWN_pronoun} despises pollution, and appreciates being anywhere without its taint.

li.label: mentor
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} takes any opportunity {PAWN_pronoun} can to arm others with knowledge. Whenever {PAWN_pronoun} socially interacts with someone, they gain experience in a random skill both parties can use.

li.label: xenotypist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts those of different xenotypes. {PAWN_pronoun} may not mind variation in the genetics of {PAWN_possessive} own kind, but even xenotypes very similar to {PAWN_possessive} own are disgusting in {PAWN_possessive} eyes.

li.label: catastrophist
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is fascinated with the idea of the world ending. Climate calamities, incoming planetkillers, and rising anomalous activity will all improve {PAWN_possessive} mood.

li.label: corruptible
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is linked to a dark influence. The further it influences reality, the more sensitive {PAWN_pronoun} becomes to the supernatural... but it also takes a toll on {PAWN_possessive} sanity.

li.label: haunted
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is inextricably connected to a lurking, invisible presence. It will infrequently attempt to attack {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: monster hunter
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} knows that the best eldritch horror is a thoroughly destroyed one. {PAWN_pronoun} is happy to kill them, and will be content if void activity is minimal. However, {PAWN_pronoun} may also sometimes randomly slaughter captured ones.

li.label: monster lover
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} appreciates the strange forms of nonhuman entities. {PAWN_pronoun} will be agitated if void activity is minimal. Motivated by a strange sense of compassion, {PAWN_pronoun} may randomly decide to free captive entities.

li.label: game developer
li.description: Buy Tynan's book. Otherwise, you'll find out that {PAWN_possessive} melee dps and armor penetration are over NINE THOUSAND!!1!\n\n({PAWN_nameDef} isn't actually any better at doing damage).
